Class BuildingOrderDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • buildingOrderModule.BuildingOrderDisplay

  • public class BuildingOrderDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
    BuildingOrderDisplay.java --- Display for all building order / build action manager information as well as simulation and scoring results.
    Author:
    P H - 25.07.2017

      • showInformation

        public static void showInformation(BuildActionManager manager)
        Function for showing all information regarding the building manager, scoring and states.
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager that contains the references to the specified instances that contain the information.

      • leaveOneLineFree

        private static int leaveOneLineFree(int posY)
        Function for adding the default line height to the given y position and returning it.
        Parameters:
        posY - the Integer that the default line height is going to be added to.
        Returns:
        the sum of the default line height and the given Integer.

      • showGameStates

        private static int showGameStates(BuildActionManager manager,
                                  int posY)
        Function for displaying the used GameStates of the BuildActionManager combined with their corresponding multiplier.
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager that contains the information regarding the Actions and therefore the used GameStates.
        posY - the Y position at which the text will appear on screen.
        Returns:
        the new Y position leaving one line free after all information got displayed.

      • extractScoringActions

        private static java.util.HashSet<ScoringAction> extractScoringActions(java.util.HashSet<javaGOAP.GoapAction> actions)
        Function for extracting all ScoringActions from a Set of given GoapActions. All actions that implement the specific Interface are returned.
        Parameters:
        actions - the actions that are going to be converted.
        Returns:
        a HashSet of ScoringActions that were converted using a Set of GoapActions.

      • extractUsedGameStates

        private static java.util.HashSet<GameState> extractUsedGameStates(java.util.HashSet<ScoringAction> scoringActions)
        Function for extracting the used GameStates from a HashSet of ScoringActions.
        Parameters:
        scoringActions - the actions whose GameStates are being extracted.
        Returns:
        a HashSet of GameStates that the provided ScoringActions use.

      • showGeneratedScores

        private static int showGeneratedScores(BuildActionManager manager,
                                       int posY)
        Function for displaying the used Actions of the BuildActionManager as well as their corresponding scores.
        Parameters:
        manager - the manager that contains the information regarding the Actions and therefore their corresponding scores.
        posY - the Y position at which the text will appear on screen.
        Returns:
        the new Y position leaving one line free after all information got displayed.
